results.name: default/wordpress-57494c479b-drt56

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: Get "http://10.244.2.4:80/wp-admin/install.php": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the request to the specified URL timed out.

Solution: 
1. Check network connectivity to the pod.
2. Increase the timeout setting for the readiness probe.
3. Ensure the application is running and listening on the correct port.

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-57494c479b-drt56], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-57494c479b-drt56' isn't ready. Expected 1 ready pod.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-57494c479b-drt56`.
3. Verify readiness probe configuration.
4. Ensure all dependencies are running.
